def is_towel_near_sink(sink:item):
    # Determine whether there is a towel near the specified sink
    symbol towel_near=exists towel:item : is_towel(towel) and close(towel, sink)
    return towel_near

def is_cleaning_solution_near_sink(sink:item):
    # Determine whether there is cleaning solution near the specified sink
    symbol cleaning_solution_near=exists cleaning_solution:item : is_cleaning_solution(cleaning_solu
tion) and close(cleaning_solution, sink)
    return cleaning_solution_near

behavior prepare_wiping_tools(sink:item):
    body:
        if is_towel_near_sink(sink):
            bind towel: item where:
                is_towel(towel) and close(towel, sink)
            achieve_once inhand(towel)
            # Grasp the towel

        if is_cleaning_solution_near_sink(sink):
            bind cleaning_solution: item where:
                is_cleaning_solution(cleaning_solution) and close(cleaning_solution, sink)
            achieve_once inhand(cleaning_solution)
            # Grasp the cleaning solution

behavior wipe_sink(sink:item):
    body:
        scrub(sink) # Wipe the sink with the available tools

behavior __goal__():
